description:
Tangle Bay has been operating nodes in the IOTA ecosystem since 2017. Gradually, the whole project has grown and also the different services that are now provided by Tangle Bay. The main focus is on quality and availability and the whole thing together with the IOTA community. Tangle Bay has been operating public nodes for the IOTA community since 2017. We put a lot of emphasis on high availability and quality. For this purpose, we use several load balancers, which are located in different countries. We also do this with our nodes to achieve the highest possible reliability.
*********Copy and paste the donation address in the award submission for xp**********
name: tanglebay.com
